text: The men's high jump event at the 2006 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Beijing, China, at Chaoyang Sports Centre on 15 and 17 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Huang Haiqiang ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Niki Palli ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Bohdan Bondarenko ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
